Game.Name: Pirates of the Caribbean - The Curse of the Black Pearl (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Based on the 2003 Disney film of the same name, this game is designed with a blend of role-playing and actionPirates of the Caribbean (GBA) takes place in a large group of Caribbean islands during the golden age of piracy and high seas adventure.The player takes command of a ship and its crew, swordfights with other captains, accepts daring quests, and chases rumours of dangers and riches.Action takes place using an isometric view, and is split into two gameplay styles - exploration and battle.Cheat: Cheat PasswordsYou need to choose Continue Game from the Main Menu. After that you can enter any of the following passwords.Cheat: Cheat PasswordsChoose Continue game and input the passwordCheat: Cheat PasswordsStart Game and choose 'Continue Game' to enter the password.
Game.Notes: It's mutiny on the high seas as you steal, barter and pillage your way to riches in the video game that accompanies Disney's major live action film for Summer 2003. Search for treasure as you defend your pirating skills with cannons, artillery and swords in an all out battle for the ultimate in pirate booty!
